name: Classic Chicken Stir Fry
description: A quick and delicious Asian-inspired chicken stir fry with vegetables.
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Heat oil in wok, cook chicken, add vegetables, season with soy sauce and ginger.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Creamy Italian pasta with bacon and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta water.

name: Vegetarian Chili
description: Hearty vegetarian chili packed with beans and vegetables.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in crockpot. Cook on low for 4 hours or high for 2 hours.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Rich and creamy Indian butter chicken with aromatic spices.
instructions: Marinate chicken. Cook in butter with spices and tomatoes. Add cream and simmer.

name: Grilled Fish Tacos
description: Light and flavorful fish tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Season and grill fish. Serve in tortillas with cabbage, cilantro, and avocado.

name: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
description: Healthy Mediterranean bowl with quinoa, vegetables, and feta.
instructions: Cook quinoa. Chop vegetables. Mix all ingredients and dress with lemon and olive oil.

name: Beef and Broccoli
description: Classic Chinese takeout favorite made at home.
instructions: Slice beef thinly. Stir fry with broccoli and sauce. Serve hot.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Simple and classic Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella and basil.
instructions: Roll out dough. Top with sauce, cheese, and basil. Bake at 475°F for 12-15 minutes.

name: Crockpot Pulled Pork
description: Tender pulled pork perfect for sandwiches or tacos.
instructions: Place pork in crockpot with seasonings. Cook on low 8 hours. Shred and mix with sauce.

name: Spicy Thai Basil Chicken
description: Quick and fiery Thai stir fry with holy basil.
instructions: Stir fry chicken with garlic and chilies. Add basil and sauces. Serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layered pasta with vegetables, ricotta, and marinara sauce.
instructions: Layer noodles with cheese mixture and vegetables. Bake covered 50 minutes, then uncovered 15 minutes.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Creamy tomato curry with marinated chicken pieces.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook in instant pot with sauce ingredients for 15 minutes.

name: Black Bean Burrito Bowl
description: Healthy burrito bowl with black beans, rice, and fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook rice and warm beans. Assemble bowls with toppings. Dress with lime juice.

name: Lemon Herb Salmon
description: Pan-seared salmon with fresh lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season salmon with herbs and lemon. Pan sear 4-5 minutes per side.

name: Beef Chili
description: Hearty beef chili with beans and bold spices.
instructions: Brown beef. Add to crockpot with all ingredients. Cook on low 5 hours.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Simple Italian salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil. Drizzle with oil and vinegar.

name: Pad Thai
description: Popular Thai rice noodle dish with tamarind sauce.
instructions: Soak noodles. Stir fry shrimp and eggs. Add noodles and sauce. Top with peanuts and sprouts.

name: Greek Stuffed Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with seasoned ground beef and rice.
instructions: Brown beef with onions and garlic. Mix with rice and tomatoes. Stuff peppers and bake 45 minutes.

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with peppers and onions.
instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Sauté with spices. Serve in warm tortillas.

name: Minestrone Soup
description: Classic Italian vegetable soup with pasta and beans.
instructions: Sauté vegetables. Add broth and beans. Simmer 30 minutes. Add pasta and spinach.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Japanese-inspired chicken bowl with teriyaki sauce.
instructions: Make teriyaki sauce. Cook chicken and glaze. Serve over rice with steamed broccoli.

name: Shakshuka
description: Middle Eastern poached eggs in spicy tomato sauce.
instructions: Sauté vegetables with spices. Create wells and crack eggs. Cover and simmer until eggs set.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Pizza topped with BBQ chicken, red onion, and cilantro.
instructions: Cook and shred chicken, mix with BBQ sauce. Top dough with chicken and cheese. Bake 15 minutes.

name: Vegetable Curry
description: Aromatic vegetable curry with coconut milk.
instructions: Sauté spices and onions. Add vegetables and coconut milk. Pressure cook 8 minutes.

name: Carne Asada Tacos
description: Grilled marinated steak tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Marinate steak 2 hours. Grill 4-5 minutes per side. Slice and serve in tortillas.

name: Pesto Pasta
description: Simple pasta with homemade basil pesto.
instructions: Cook pasta. Blend basil, nuts, cheese, and garlic with oil. Toss with pasta.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Comforting homemade chicken soup with vegetables.
instructions: Add chicken, vegetables, and broth to crockpot. Cook on low 6 hours. Shred chicken, add noodles.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Garlicky shrimp in white wine butter sauce.
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter. Add shrimp and wine. Toss with pasta and lemon.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick fried rice with eggs and vegetables.
instructions: Scramble eggs. Fry rice with vegetables. Add soy sauce and eggs. Toss well.

name: Instant Pot Mac and Cheese
description: Creamy mac and cheese made in the instant pot.
instructions: Cook pasta in instant pot 4 minutes. Stir in cheese, milk, and butter until creamy.
